title: RELIGULOUS starts tonight
body: In case you missed it last night, KOLR 10 / KSFX ran a story on us choosing to show RELIGULOUS. You can check it out here. Nicole and I will both be working tonight, which has been a rarity over the last two weeks. Half of the floors have been sealed, and we'll be installing speakers and having the alarm system put in this weekend. It's going to be a very busy weekend at both Moxies.
author: Dan

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
Hey, misspelling the first word of an article, that's our News Leader!

*winks, gives a thumbs up*
